test_cases.scenario: Scenario 1: Verify FeedbackSection renders correctly with all 4 links and correct URLs
test_cases.evidence: tests/unit/components/worktree/feedback-section.test.tsx: 7 tests passed. Verifies 4 links (Bug Report, Feature Request, Question, View Issues) render with correct GitHub URLs from github-links.ts constants.

test_cases.scenario: Scenario 2: Verify issue create command template mapping (--bug -> Bug Report, --feature -> Feature Request, --question -> Question)
test_cases.evidence: tests/unit/cli/commands/issue.test.ts: 13 tests passed. Tests confirm --bug maps to 'Bug Report', --feature maps to 'Feature Request', --question maps to 'Question' template names via TEMPLATE_MAP.

test_cases.scenario: Scenario 3: Verify input validation rejects oversized title/body and sanitizes labels
test_cases.evidence: tests/unit/cli/commands/issue.test.ts: SEC-MF-001 tests verify title >256 chars rejected with exit code 99, body >65536 chars rejected with exit code 99. SEC-SF-001 tests verify control characters and zero-width characters stripped from labels.

test_cases.scenario: Scenario 4: Verify docs command retrieves sections, searches, and prevents path traversal
test_cases.evidence: tests/unit/cli/commands/docs.test.ts: 7 tests passed. tests/unit/cli/utils/docs-reader.test.ts: 14 tests passed. Docs reader uses SECTION_MAP whitelist to prevent path traversal. SEC-SF-002 search query length limit enforced at 256 chars.

test_cases.scenario: Scenario 5: Verify gh CLI dependency check and graceful degradation
test_cases.evidence: tests/unit/cli/commands/issue.test.ts: Test 'should exit with DEPENDENCY_ERROR when gh is not installed' confirms process.exit(1) called. tests/unit/cli/config/cli-dependencies.test.ts: 15 tests passed, verifying gh CLI registered as optional dependency.

test_cases.scenario: Scenario 6: Verify GitHub URL constants are consistent and correctly derived from base URL
test_cases.evidence: tests/unit/config/github-links.test.ts: 10 tests passed. All URLs verified as derived from GITHUB_REPO_BASE_URL = 'https://github.com/Kewton/CommandMate'.

test_cases.scenario: Scenario 7: Verify existing tests (version-checker, init, cli-dependencies) remain passing
test_cases.evidence: tests/unit/lib/version-checker.test.ts: 56 tests passed. tests/unit/cli/commands/init.test.ts: 4 tests passed. All 126 Issue #264 related tests passed. Full unit test suite: 167/168 files passed (3264 tests), 1 infrastructure error (Vitest worker fork crash, unrelated to Issue #264).

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-1: FeedbackSection UI component renders 4 feedback links (Bug Report, Feature Request, Question, View Issues) in InfoModal and MobileInfoContent
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: FeedbackSection.tsx renders 4 links from links array. WorktreeDetailRefactored.tsx includes <FeedbackSection> in both InfoModal (line 513) and MobileInfoContent (line 781).

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-2: All feedback links point to correct GitHub template URLs defined in src/config/github-links.ts
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: FeedbackSection imports GITHUB_BUG_REPORT_URL, GITHUB_FEATURE_REQUEST_URL, GITHUB_QUESTION_URL, GITHUB_ISSUES_URL from @/config/github-links. Unit test confirms all 4 URLs match constants.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-3: All links have rel='noopener noreferrer' and target='_blank' for security
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: FeedbackSection.tsx line 60-61: target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' on all <a> elements. Unit tests verify these attributes on every link.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-4: commandmate issue create supports --bug/--feature/--question flags with correct gh CLI template name mapping
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: issue.ts TEMPLATE_MAP: bug->'Bug Report', feature->'Feature Request', question->'Question'. Unit tests confirm all three mappings pass correct --template values to gh CLI.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-5: commandmate issue create validates title (max 256 chars) and body (max 65536 chars)
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: input-validators.ts: MAX_TITLE_LENGTH=256, MAX_BODY_LENGTH=65536. validateIssueTitle() and validateIssueBody() used in issue.ts. Unit tests verify rejection of oversized inputs.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-6: commandmate issue create sanitizes labels (strips control characters, zero-width characters)
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: input-validators.ts sanitizeLabel() uses regex /[\u0000-\u001F\u007F-\u009F\u200B-\u200F\uFEFF]/g. issue.ts applies sanitizeLabel() to each label. Unit tests verify control and zero-width characters stripped.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-7: commandmate issue search passes query to gh issue list --search
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: issue.ts search subcommand: spawnSync('gh', ['issue', 'list', '--search', query]). Unit test confirms query passed to --search argument.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-8: commandmate issue list calls gh issue list
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: issue.ts list subcommand: spawnSync('gh', ['issue', 'list']). Unit test confirms gh issue list called.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-9: commandmate docs --section shows documentation section content
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: docs.ts handles options.section by calling readSection() from docs-reader.ts. DocsReader uses SECTION_MAP whitelist with 8 documentation sections.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-10: commandmate docs --search performs case-insensitive search across sections
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: docs-reader.ts searchDocs() converts query to lowercase and uses String.prototype.includes() for case-insensitive matching across all SECTION_MAP entries.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-11: commandmate docs --all lists all available sections
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: docs.ts handles options.all by calling getAvailableSections() and logging each section name.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-12: commandmate docs rejects path traversal attempts
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: docs-reader.ts uses SECTION_MAP whitelist. isValidSection() checks if section name exists as a key. readSection() re-validates. Path traversal strings (e.g., '../etc/passwd') are not valid keys. Unit tests in docs-reader.test.ts verify this.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-13: commandmate docs --search rejects queries exceeding 256 characters (SEC-SF-002)
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: docs-reader.ts: MAX_SEARCH_QUERY_LENGTH=256. searchDocs() throws Error if query.length > 256. Unit test in docs-reader.test.ts verifies rejection.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-14: gh CLI is registered as optional dependency in cli-dependencies.ts
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: cli-dependencies.ts DEPENDENCIES array includes { name: 'gh CLI', command: 'gh', versionArg: '--version', required: false }. Unit test in cli-dependencies.test.ts verifies.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-15: issue/docs commands exit with DEPENDENCY_ERROR (1) when gh CLI is not installed
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: issue.ts isGhAvailable() checks gh --version. On failure, process.exit(ExitCode.DEPENDENCY_ERROR) which equals 1. Unit test confirms exit code 1.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-16: GitHub URLs are centralized in src/config/github-links.ts (DRY principle)
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: github-links.ts defines GITHUB_REPO_BASE_URL and derives all URLs: GITHUB_ISSUES_URL, GITHUB_NEW_ISSUE_URL, GITHUB_BUG_REPORT_URL, GITHUB_FEATURE_REQUEST_URL, GITHUB_QUESTION_URL, GITHUB_RELEASE_URL_PREFIX, GITHUB_SECURITY_GUIDE_URL. Unit tests verify derivation.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-17: commandmate init displays AI tool integration guide after success
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: init.ts line 257: console.log(AI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE) after successful initialization. AI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE defined in ai-integration-messages.ts with issue/docs command examples.

acceptance_criteria_status.criterion: AC-18: i18n keys exist for en and ja locales (feedback.title, feedback.bugReport, feedback.featureRequest, feedback.question, feedback.viewIssues)
acceptance_criteria_status.evidence: locales/en/worktree.json: feedback.title='Feedback & Support', feedback.bugReport='Report a bug', feedback.featureRequest='Request a feature', feedback.question='Ask a question', feedback.viewIssues='View all issues'. locales/ja/worktree.json: all corresponding Japanese translations present.

quality_checks.unit_tests_issue264: passed (8 test files, 126 tests, all passed)
quality_checks.unit_tests_full: 167/168 test files passed, 3264 tests passed, 7 skipped, 1 infrastructure error (Vitest worker fork crash, unrelated to Issue #264)

message: All 18 acceptance criteria verified. All 7 test scenarios passed. Quality checks (TypeScript, ESLint, CLI build) all passed. Full unit test suite: 3264/3264 tests passed (1 Vitest infrastructure error unrelated to Issue #264).
